verses.text: \w Preserve|strong="H8104"\w* me, O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*: for in thee do I put my \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*.\f + \fr 16.1 \ft Michtam: or, A golden Psalm\f*

\add O my soul\add*, thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Thou \add art\add* my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*: my \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* \add extendeth\add* not to thee;

\add But\add* to the \w saints|strong="H6918"\w* \w that|strong="H1992"\w* \add are\add* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \add to\add* the \w excellent|strong="H0117"\w*, in whom \add is\add* all my \w delight|strong="H2656"\w*.

Their \w sorrows|strong="H6094"\w* shall be \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \add that\add* \w hasten|strong="H4116"\w* \add after\add* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \add god:\add* their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* will I not \w offer|strong="H5258"\w*, \w nor|strong="H1077"\w* take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w* into my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*.\f + \fr 16.4 \ft hasten…: or, give gifts to another\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w portion|strong="H4490"\w* of mine \w inheritance|strong="H2506"\w* and of my \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*: thou \w maintainest|strong="H8551"\w* my \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*.\f + \fr 16.5 \ft of mine…: Heb. of my part\f*
The \w lines|strong="H2256"\w* are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* unto me in \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w* \add places;\add* yea, I have a \w goodly|strong="H8231"\w* \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*.

I will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who hath given me \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*: my \w reins|strong="H3629"\w* also \w instruct|strong="H3256"\w* me in the night \w seasons|strong="H3915"\w*.

I have \w set|strong="H7737"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w always|strong="H8548"\w* before me: because \add he is\add* at my right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, I shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.

Therefore my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, and my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H1523"\w*: my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* also shall \w rest|strong="H7931"\w* in \w hope|strong="H0983"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft rest…: Heb. dwell confidently\f*

For thou wilt not \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* in \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*; neither wilt thou \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* thine Holy \w One|strong="H2623"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w corruption|strong="H7845"\w*.

Thou wilt \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* me the \w path|strong="H0734"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: in thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w fulness|strong="H7648"\w* of \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*; at thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \add there are\add* \w pleasures|strong="H5273"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H5331"\w*.
